languages.text: "Закон Империума суров, но не всякий проступок карается смертью. Инцендия возомнила себя выше закона, а это — ересь".

traits.locale_text: "Закон Империума суров, но не всякий проступок карается смертью. Инцендия возомнила себя выше закона, а это — ересь".

languages.text: "The law of the Imperium is harsh, but not every transgression is punishable by death. Incendia thinks herself above the law, and that is heresy."
languages.original_text: "Закон Империума суров, но не всякий проступок карается смертью. Инцендия возомнила себя выше закона, а это — ересь".

traits.locale_text: "The law of the Imperium is harsh, but not every transgression is punishable by death. Incendia thinks herself above the law, and that is heresy."
"The law of the Imperium is harsh, but not every transgression is punishable by death. Incendia thinks herself above the law, and that is heresy."
"The law of the Imperium is harsh, but not every transgression is punishable by death. Incendia thinks herself above the law, and that is heresy."
"The law of the Imperium is harsh, but not every transgression is punishable by death. Incendia thinks herself above the law, and that is heresy."
"The law of the Imperium is harsh, but not every transgression is punishable by death. Incendia thinks herself above the law, and that is heresy."
"The law of the Imperium is harsh, but not every transgression is punishable by death. Incendia thinks herself above the law, and that is heresy."

languages.text: “帝国的法律确实很严厉，但并非所有违法行为都会被判处死刑。因森蒂娅以为自己可以凌驾于帝国的法律之上，这是异端思想。”
languages.original_text: "The law of the Imperium is harsh, but not every transgression is punishable by death. Incendia thinks herself above the law, and that is heresy."

traits.locale_text: “帝国的法律确实很严厉，但并非所有违法行为都会被判处死刑。因森蒂娅以为自己可以凌驾于帝国的法律智商，这是异端思想。”

languages.text: 「帝国の法は厳しいが、すべての罪が死で罰される訳ではない。インセンディアは自身の存在が法の上にあると思い込んでいるが、それ自体が異端志向なのだ」
languages.original_text: "The law of the Imperium is harsh, but not every transgression is punishable by death. Incendia thinks herself above the law, and that is heresy."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国の法は厳しいが、すべての罪が死で罰される訳ではない。インセンディアは自身の存在が法の上にあると思い込んでいるが、それ自体が異端志向なのだ」

languages.text: «La ley del Imperium es dura, pero no todas las transgresiones se castigan con la muerte. Incendia cree estar por encima de la ley y eso es herejía».
languages.original_text: "The law of the Imperium is harsh, but not every transgression is punishable by death. Incendia thinks herself above the law, and that is heresy."

traits.locale_text: «La ley del Imperium es dura, pero no todas las transgresiones se castigan con la muerte. Incendia cree estar por encima de la ley y eso es herejía».

languages.text: "Das Gesetz des Imperiums ist harsch, aber nicht auf jede Sünde steht die Todesstrafe. Incendia glaubt, sie stehe über dem Gesetz, und das ist Ketzerei."
languages.original_text: "The law of the Imperium is harsh, but not every transgression is punishable by death. Incendia thinks herself above the law, and that is heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Das Gesetz des Imperiums ist harsch, aber nicht auf jede Sünde steht die Todesstrafe. Incendia glaubt, sie stehe über dem Gesetz, und das ist Ketzerei."

languages.text: « Les lois de l'Imperium sont dures, mais toutes les transgressions ne méritent pas la mort. Incendia se croit au-dessus des lois, et il n'y a pas pire hérésie. »
languages.original_text: "The law of the Imperium is harsh, but not every transgression is punishable by death. Incendia thinks herself above the law, and that is heresy."

traits.locale_text: « Les lois de l'Imperium sont dures, mais toutes les transgressions ne méritent pas la mort. Incendia se croit au-dessus des lois, et il n'y a pas pire hérésie. »

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'un kanunları sert olsa da her bir kanun ihlali, idam gerektirmez. İncendia, kendisinin kanunların üstünde olduğunu düşünüyor. Bu kâfirliktir."
languages.original_text: "The law of the Imperium is harsh, but not every transgression is punishable by death. Incendia thinks herself above the law, and that is heresy."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk'un kanunları serttir ancak tüm kanun ihlalleri idam gerektirmez. İncendia kendisinin kanunların üstünde olduğunu düşünüyor ve bu kâfirliktir."
